snippet: Before Watchmen, telling the histories of the crime fighters featured in Watchmen, is set to start this summer, even if Alan Moore isn’t happy about it.
abstract: DC Comics plans to publish comic Before Watchmen, a mini-series of prequels to the influential comic-book series Watchmen.
lead_paragraph: Before Watchmen, telling the histories of the crime fighters featured in Watchmen, is set to start this summer, even if Alan Moore isn’t happy about it.

headline.seo: DC Comics Plans Prequels to Watchmen Series
headline.main: DC Plans Prequels to Watchmen Series
headline.print_headline: DC Plans Prequels To Watchmen Series
